meanings.definition: A building or complex of buildings containing a number of individually owned apartments or houses.
meanings.sent1: The condominiums in the complex have different owners.
meanings.sent2: I live in a condominium with my family.
meanings.sent3: The condominiums in the building decided to have a potluck party.
meanings.sent4: The condominiums stood tall like a row of colorful blocks.
meanings.sent5: The variety of condominiums in the area makes it a vibrant community.

meanings.definition: The individual apartment or house in a condominium complex.
meanings.sent1: Each of the condominiums has its own unique style.
meanings.sent2: She decorated her condominium with modern furniture.
meanings.sent3: The tiny dog in the condominiums thinks he's the boss.
meanings.sent4: Her cozy condominium was a peaceful retreat from the city.
meanings.sent5: The view from the top floor condominiums was breathtaking.
